title: Blueprint, "Gilbert Seldes Apartment: Living Room Furniture Details", c. 1930
medium: Blueprint, graphite, and yellow crayon on white wove paper
markings: Stamp in upper left corner: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in upper left corner: DETAILS OF FURNITURE IN LIVING ROOM DWG # 4/GILBERT SELDES ESQ./10 HENDERSON PL. N.Y.C.; inscribed in yellow crayon at lower right: Brushed/Alum tubing; dimensions and instructions inscribed throughout.
description: Plan and elevations showing section of living room, and book shelves. Day bed or bed in corner of south wall, with bin for pictures or magazines at right and shelving unit at left. Bookshelves in a wide L-shape formation with brushed aluminum tubing supports between shelves.
